comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Not the Canadian Dr. Mary Crawford of the same era: www.mhs.mb.ca/docs/features/timelinks/reference/db0013.shtml This Dr. Mary Crawford was from Brooklyn and was part of a group of doctors who went to help at the American Ambulance Hospital in Paris; she returned in the autumn of 1915 and gave an interview to the New York Times about her experiences there ("Woman Surgeon Home from War: Dr. Mary Crawford Says American Hospital in Paris Has Accomplished Wonders," 1 October 1915).

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca:

Thanks for the information on Dr. Mary Crawford - and for pointing out which Dr. Mary Crawford she was!  We will add more information about her to the record.
